amendment.description: An amendment to add language to the bill to assure that funding of Federal programs would continue at funding levels of the previous year until such time as regular appropriations bills are enacted.

action.text: Mr. Farr raised a point of order against the Shadegg amendment (A004). Mr. Farr stated that the provisions of the amendment were not germane to the bill and was, therefor, in violation of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.
